AVSEC ORDER NO.  07 / 2009 
 
 
Sub: Issue of Airport Entry Passes during VIP/VVIP movements.  
 
 
Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation), Bureau of Civil Aviation 
Security, in exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of Aircraft Act 1934 
delegated to him vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification 
No. 1797 dated July 3, 1997 read with Rule 90 of Aircraft Rules 1937 hereby 
directs that:  
 
(i) 
During VVIP/VIP movements, the RDCOS, BCAS / the Aerodrome 
Incharge of the Airports (where BCAS officer is not posted) shall issue one time 
entry permit to Police personnel for accessing into the restricted area of the  
airports, for official duties, on written request from local State Administration. 
 
(ii) 
An officer of the State Police, not below the rank of Supdt. of Police , shall 
send the request for such airport entry pass and co-ordinate with concerned 
agencies for smooth working arrangements.   
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
 
(M.Malaviya) 
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
